title: South Carolina Prisoner Chooses to Be Executed by Firing Squad - The New York Times
content:
1. South Carolina Prisoner Chooses to Be Executed by Firing Squad  The New York Times

description: Richard B. Moore chose a firing squad over electrocution but said both methods were unconstitutional. His execution, set for this month, would be the countryâ€™s first by firing squad since 2010.
